attributes.action: Mandatory Enlistment To The Services For Offenders
attributes.additional_details:
With the recent disturbances around London and other parts of our country all offenders should be given a mandatory enlistment to any of our armed forces.
Prison has not & will not deter criminals these days as our justice system is too soft.
If these sorts of people want to cause trouble and have fights let them do it for our country.
